reviewText: Wonderful movie!  I purchased it second hand and it's a great addition to our movie collection.
A joke not happy won't fall for it again
Absolutely NOT at all. It would not play in either of my players. A waist of my money. VERY DISAPPOINTED.
Purchased this thinking it was similar to the tin case blu-rays you get at Best Buy, however after trying to watch, I learned it won't play on US blu-Ray players. Avoid!!!
Was not aware this movie does not play on us dvd players, so won't know how to rate it, 1 star only cuz I had to

This is a fantastic film, i give it a 5 star rating,
You can feel the reality of what it must of been like to live in a time like that.
I expected to receive e movie in English or at least with subtitles in this language, BUT just Italian, both??? Incredible!!!!
BEST MOVIE EVER!!!!!!!
I couldn't see the movie it is for another  region i live in usa im sad the movie is very good
Just tried to view for first time & Will not play!!  Error states: Wrong country code.

No it did not...I cannot play it and although some obscure part of the listing indicated it was a region specific dvd..I did not see that. Those kind if things should be up front and center in the main listing not in an area buyers may not enter. Total BS
The product stated all region but it can be played in my country. What should i do?
It wasn't. I couldn't watch the video because it was region protected.

Ignore the morons who slammed the movie with one star based on buying the wrong region DVD for their area, these reviews are the movie itself, not "their" mistakes made ordering the wrong DVD.
Moving on,,,, The Movie is GREAT!!!  Realistic portrayal and well told and well shown, Excellent story, awesome realism, incredible detail, exciting to the end, it just doesn't get any better!  The BEST PART is its RE-WATCHABLE!!!  I've enjoyed it about 8 times over the years.

Thought it would work on my ps4 here in the US but the Playstation is region locked which was my fault for not making sure. Other than that the case is really nice, looks great, and love the steel book. Bought a used USA version and switched the cases. Maybe not worth the $35 dollars (at the time or purchase) for the case but worth it if the movie worked for me lol
